overview: What makes a birthday party more than a birthday party? A stripper, of course. And what better place to find one than from Stripper Service? One phone call brings you a selection of the hottest hard bodies in town, each one more than willing to take it all off... and get it on. When some studs plan a special birthday party, the stripper is just the icing on the cake. After this, you'll wish birthdays came more than once a year!
tagline: They take it off... to get it on.
title: Stripper Service
